messages.name: Sarah kuong
messages.message: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.

messages.name: Winston Churchill
messages.message: The Pessimist Sees Difficulty In Every Opportunity. The Optimist Sees Opportunity In Every Difficulty.
